DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Week Attendance
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":6,"WidgetRows":20,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with TimeZone as (
	select 
		c.DefaultTimeZone
	from 
		[User] u left outer join Company c on u.Company = c.Oid
	where
		u.Oid = @CurrentUserId
),
EntryTime as (    
    select 
		a.[User],
        ad.Attendance as Id,
		ad.[Time] as InTimeUTC,
        cast(ad.[Time] AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as InTime,
        ad.AdjustedTime as InAdjustedUTC,
		cast(ad.AdjustedTime AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as InAdjusted,
		ad.Motive as ReasonInAdjusted
    from
        AttendanceDetail ad left outer join Attendance a on a.Oid = ad.Attendance, 
		TimeZone tz
    where 
        ad.[Type] = 0
		and a.[Day] between @FromDate and @ToDate
),
ExitTime as (
    select 
		a.[User],
        ad.Attendance as Id,
        ad.[Time] as OutTimeUTC,
		cast(ad.[Time] AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as OutTime,
        ad.AdjustedTime as OutAdjustedUTC,
		cast(ad.AdjustedTime AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE tz.DefaultTimeZone as datetime) as OutAdjusted,
		ad.Motive as ReasonOutAdjusted
    from
        AttendanceDetail ad left outer join Attendance a on a.Oid = ad.Attendance, 
		TimeZone tz
    where 
        ad.[Type] = 1
		and a.[Day] between @FromDate and @ToDate
),
Timesheets as (
	select 
		v.UserId, 
		v.[Date],
		v.StateTypeCode as TimesheetStatus,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as Actual
	from 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
			left outer join Timesheet t on t.Oid = v.Oid
	where
		v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	group by 
		v.UserId,
		v.[Date],
		v.StateTypeCode
),
Leaves as (
	select 
		v.UserId, 
		v.[Date],
		IIF(v.LeaveType = 'LWOP' or v.LeaveType = 'Leave Without Pay', 1, 0) as LWOP,
		sum(v.[Hours]) as Leave,
		IIF(v.Approved = 1, 1, IIF(v.Rejected = 1, 2, 0)) as [LeaveStatus]
	from 
		Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) v
	where
		v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate
	group by 
		v.UserId,
		v.[Date],
		v.LeaveType,
		v.Approved,
		v.Rejected
),
WeekDates as (
	select @FromDate as [Date], 'Monday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 1, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Tuesday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 2, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Wednesday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 3, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Thursday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 4, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Friday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 5, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Saturday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Sunday' as [WeekDay], a.[User] as [User]
	from Attendance a
	where (a.[Day] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))

	union

	select @FromDate as [Date], 'Monday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 1, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Tuesday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 2, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Wednesday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 3, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Thursday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 4, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Friday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 5, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Saturday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Sunday' as [WeekDay], l.[UserId] as [User]
	from Leaves l
	where (l.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))

	union

	select @FromDate as [Date], 'Monday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 1, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Tuesday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 2, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Wednesday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 3, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Thursday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 4, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Friday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 5, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Saturday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
	union
	select DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate) as [Date], 'Sunday' as [WeekDay], t.[UserId] as [User]
	from Timesheets t
	where (t.[Date] between @FromDate and DateAdd(dd, 6, @FromDate))
),
getEntryAndExit as (
	select 
		a.[User],
		a.[Day],
		IIF(t.TimesheetStatus = 1, e.OutAdjusted, e.OutTime) as [Exit],
		IIF(t.TimesheetStatus = 1, v.InAdjusted, v.InTime) as [Entry]
	from
		Attendance a
			left outer join EntryTime v on v.Id = a.Oid
			left outer join ExitTime e on e.Id = a.Oid
			left outer join Timesheets t on (t.UserId = a.[User] and cast(t.[Date] as date) = cast(a.[Day] as date))
	where
		a.[Day] between @FromDate and @ToDate
),
UnderTime as (
	select 
		a.[User],
		a.[Day],
		IIF(	g.[Exit] is null or
				g.[Entry] is null, 0,
			datediff(minute, 0, 
				CASE 
					WHEN	cast(g.[Exit] - g.[Entry] - 
							cast(concat(a.BreakTotalMinutes/60,':', a.BreakTotalMinutes%60) as datetime) as time) < cast('8:00' as time) 
							and cast(g.[Entry] as time) > cast('11:00' as time) 
						THEN	(cast('8:00' as datetime) - 
								cast(g.[Exit] - g.[Entry] - 
								cast(concat(a.BreakTotalMinutes/60,':', a.BreakTotalMinutes%60) as datetime) as datetime)) + 
								cast('4:00' as datetime) - 
								cast(FORMAT(FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0))*100 + (IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)-FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)))*60,'00:00') as datetime)
					WHEN	cast(g.[Exit] - g.[Entry] - 
							cast(concat(a.BreakTotalMinutes/60,':', a.BreakTotalMinutes%60) as datetime) + 
							cast(FORMAT(FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0))*100 + (IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)-FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)))*60,'00:00') as datetime) as time) < 
							cast('8:00' as time)
						THEN	cast('8:00' as datetime) - 
								cast(g.[Exit] - g.[Entry] - 
								cast(concat(a.BreakTotalMinutes/60,':', a.BreakTotalMinutes%60) as datetime) as datetime) - 
								cast(FORMAT(FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0))*100 + (IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0) - FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)))*60,'00:00') as datetime)
					WHEN cast(g.[Entry] as time) > cast('11:00' as time) and IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave), 0) <= 4
						THEN	cast('4:00' as datetime) - 
								cast(FORMAT(FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0))*100 + (IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)-FLOOR(IsNull(IIF(l.LWOP = 1, 0, l.Leave),0)))*60,'00:00') as datetime)
					ELSE 0
			END 
		)) as UnderTime
	from 
		Attendance a
			left outer join getEntryAndExit g on (g.[User] = a.[User] and cast(g.[Day] as date) = cast(a.[Day] as date))
			left outer join Leaves l on (l.UserId = a.[User] and cast(l.[Date] as date) = cast(a.[Day] as date))
	where
		a.[Day] between @FromDate and @ToDate
)
select 
	distinct du.Department as DepartmentName,
	du.UserTypologyGroup,
	du.HasImage,
	du.Oid,
	du.FullName as [Name],
	uuf.[Attendance Id] as AttendanceId,
	du.ExternalId,
	wd.[Date],
	wd.[WeekDay],
	IsNull(v.InTimeUTC, 0) as InTimeUTC,
	IsNull(v.InTime, 0) as InTime,
	IsNull(v.InAdjustedUTC, 0) as InAdjustedUTC,
	IsNull(v.ReasonInAdjusted, '') as ReasonInAdjusted,
	IsNull(v.InAdjusted, 0) as InAdjusted,
	IsNull(e.OutTimeUTC, 0) as OutTimeUTC,
	IsNull(e.OutTime, 0) as OutTime,
	IsNull(e.OutAdjustedUTC, 0) as OutAdjustedUTC,
	IsNull(e.ReasonOutAdjusted, '') as ReasonOutAdjusted,
	IsNull(e.OutAdjusted, 0) as OutAdjusted,
	IsNull(ut.UnderTime, 0) as UnderTime,
	sum(IsNull(ut.UnderTime, 0)) over (partition by du.Oid) as TotalUnderTime,
	IsNull(round(t.Actual,2), 0) as Timesheet,
	IsNull(a.TardinessTotalMinutes, 0) as Tardiness,
	sum(IsNull(a.TardinessTotalMinutes, 0)) over (partition by du.Oid) as TotalTardiness,
	IsNull(l.Leave, 0) as Leave,
	l.LeaveStatus as LeaveStatus,
	IsNull(a.BreakTotalMinutes, 0) as BreakTotalMinutes,
	sum(IsNull(a.TardinessTotalMinutes, 0)) over (partition by du.Oid) + sum(IsNull(ut.UnderTime, 0)) over (partition by du.Oid) as TotalTardinessPlusTotalUnderTime,
	t.TimesheetStatus
from 
	WeekDates wd
		left outer join EntryTime v on (v.[User] = wd.[User] and cast(v.InTime as date) = cast(wd.[Date] as date))
		left outer join ExitTime e on (e.[User] = wd.[User] and e.Id = v.Id)
		left outer join Attendance a on (a.[User] = wd.[User] and a.Oid = v.Id)
		left outer join Leaves l on (l.UserId = wd.[User] and cast(l.[Date] as date) = cast(wd.[Date] as date))
		left outer join Analytics.[User](@CurrentUserId) du on (du.Oid = wd.[User])
		left outer join Timesheets t on (t.UserId = wd.[User] and cast(t.[Date] as date) = cast(wd.[Date] as date))
		left outer join UnderTime ut on(ut.[User] = wd.[User] and cast(ut.[Day] as date) = cast(wd.[Date] as date))
		left outer join User_UserFields uuf on uuf.Oid = du.Oid
group by
	du.Department,
	du.UserTypologyGroup,
	du.HasImage,
	du.Oid,
	uuf.[Attendance Id],
	du.FullName,
	du.ExternalId,
	wd.[Date],
	wd.[WeekDay],
	v.InTimeUTC,
	v.InTime,
	v.InAdjustedUTC,
	v.ReasonInAdjusted,
	v.InAdjusted,
	e.OutTimeUTC,
	e.OutTime,
	e.OutAdjustedUTC,
	e.ReasonOutAdjusted,
	e.OutAdjusted,
	ut.UnderTime,
	t.Actual,
	a.TardinessTotalMinutes,
	l.Leave,
	l.LeaveStatus,
	a.BreakTotalMinutes,
	t.TimesheetStatus
order by   
    du.FullName","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Last 10 Weeks
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters: [{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":6,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-9, 0) as Week\r\nunion all\r\nselect DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0) as Week","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
